snippet: The officer, Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn, was charged with misconduct in public office and violating the Official Secrets Act.
abstract: Scotland Yard Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn is accused in court of illegally leaking information to tabloid The News of the World about 2010 police inquiry into phone hacking; Casburn is first person so far to be charged in an investigation of corrupt payments to the police and other public officials by journalists.
lead_paragraph: The officer, Detective Chief Inspector April Casburn, was charged with misconduct in public office and violating the Official Secrets Act.

headline.seo: British Police Official Charged in Phone Hacking Scandal
headline.main: Police Official Accused of Leak to Tabloid Newspaper in British Phone Hacking Scandal
headline.print_headline: Police Official Accused of Leak to Tabloid Newspaper in British Phone Hacking Scandal

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
